item.description:
Thursday ~ May 23, 2013 ~ 6-9 PM

Free Butch Bazillion Show

Live Acoustic Rock & Pop Music

The Villaggio Restaurant & Tavern
56 Chelmsford Rd (Route 129)
North Billerica, MA 01862
Phone (978) 670-1995
http://www.villaggio-restaurant.com

Butch Bazillion is a Rock & Pop Singer, Guitarist, Pianist, and Bassist who started performing professionally at the young age of sixteen. He toured New England as the lead singer in bands and as a solo artist. In 1989 Butch was a member of the Boston band "Splash" who were signed by Grudge Records in New York. They were the featured band at the MTV Spring Break Party at the Daytona Sheraton. Butch has shared the stage with Leslie West (Mountain), Alvin Lee (Ten Years After), Mark Andes (Spirit, Firefall, Heart), Deon Estus (bassist for George Michael), John Cowsill (The Cowsills, Tommy Tutone, The Beach Boys), with members of Lynyrd Skynyrd and more... Splash recorded their debut album titled "Spring Break". Their song "Dizzy Miss Lizzy" was Track 1 on the Motion Picture Soundtrack for "Speed Zone", a movie by Jim Drake starring John Candy, Brooke Shields, The Smothers Brothers, Lee Van Cleef.... Butch played keyboards on this track. In the 1990's Butch lived and played in Southern California and Seattle, Washington when Grunge Music exploded onto the scene. He's now returned to the Boston Music Scene, and you'll be hearing much more of him in the future.

Butch will be playing songs made famous by Elton John, Styx, Train, Bruce Hornsby, Dave Matthews, John Mayer, The Beatles, David Gray, Oasis, Collective Soul, Gin Blossoms, Cold Play, Paul Simon, The Eagles, Rod Stewart, Brian Adams, Crosby Stills, Nash and Young, Queen, Journey, Carol King, Johnny Cash, Eric Clapton, Snow Patrol, Plain White T's, Matchbox 20, and many more...

Please LIKE and FRIEND Butch Bazillion here
